publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1688 Michael Matheson: Stenhousemuir Pilot Project—That the Parliament commends Central Scotland Police on its initiative in tackling alcohol-induced antisocial behaviour; recognises its pilot in Stenhousemuir of off-licences not selling alcohol to under-21-year-olds; congratulates the shopkeepers and the community of Stenhousemuir who are actively supporting this measure, and looks forward to the results of the exercise in due course. Supported by: Joe FitzPatrick*, Alex Neil*, Rob Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-1688 Stenhousemuir Pilot Project (lodged on 9 April 2008) Hugh O’Donnell*
